name: Wizhat
description:
The Entity has lost its magic hat. And it will do whatever it takes to find it.
You as the magical hat, you will have to use your magichat powers to find and
combine different objects of the world to solve the puzzle that will move you a step
closer to freedom, granted by Aton... The God among Gods.

Enjoy this micro demo where you will have to explore and experiment the different comninations
of the creatures and objects around you.
Absorb, expel, move and hide to solve the puzzle, while you enjoy of the the main theme created by 
Komiku and the one bit pixel art created by GokiburiGeemu.

Hope you like it and all the feedback is wel recieved.

Enjoy and expect more games from GokiburiGeemu in the near future ;).
